Text.Page: You ignited fireworks to honor Balder.

By the name of Balder.

We keep the torches burning day and night all year round, but during the festival we also set off fireworks as offerings to Balder.

, you've done so much for us...would you like to do the honors? "Sounds like fun!"

Going around the torch platform, set off these fireworks.

Ah, make sure not to do it towards people. Itâ€™s dangerous.

My thanks, .

I know this work can seem tedious, but I feel grateful to Balder every day. I hope that honoring Balder as you have helped you feel the same way.
